title: reverse his code
extract: An Easy Way to Reverse Code Scale items. by Karen Grace-Martin. Before you run a Cronbach's alpha or factor analysis on scale items, it's generally a good idea to reverse code items that are negatively worded so that a high value indicates the same type of response on every item.
extract_html: An Easy Way to Reverse Code Scale items. by Karen Grace-Martin. Before you run a Cronbach's alpha or factor analysis on scale items, it's generally a good idea to reverse code items that are negatively worded so that a high value indicates the same type of response on every item.
